resources.string: show charging state and optimized charging process
2. Real-Time reminder to help you avoid \n\t overcharging.

In This Application you will able to clean Ram, Junks, Cache and other useless folders and file which does not need to free space. You can get the list of applications installed on the device and uninstall apps. Memory info of device, Status saver to save status, internet speed feature,Wi-fi network info,Battery info, you can clean images, videos and you can clean useless data and residential files, Some basic device info.for these all features we need some permission to perform the application actions properly, helps the user to improve performance and show device information that may contain user personal data.We insure you that the user personal data or information is not collected by the company nor does the application host users data

1. Storage permission is required to get memory usage status.

2. Network state permission is required to access internet data usage information.

3. Contact permission is required to get information about camera.

4. Phone State permission is required to get information about applications.

5. Access wifi state is required to check wifi on/off state
